about_the_game:
■Basic Rules

Puzzle board operation is done with the mouse for vertical and horizontal scrolling.

Prepare to attack by aligning 3 or more blocks!

・Keepers can act 3 turns alone

・Hunters can act one turn at a time using a common board

 

When everyone's action is finished, the attack begins!

The side that shaves off the opponent's HP wins!

*If the game is not settled within 5 rounds, the side with the most remaining HP wins!

 

Special blocks that occur under certain conditions and the activation of skills that can be used after a certain number of blocks are lined up make the game even more exciting and deepening!

This is a puzzle battle game that requires not only simply aligning puzzles, but also cooperation with friends and strategy based on the opponent's actions!

■Point

 The appeal of this title is that it combines the three elements of “battle, puzzle, and voxel!

The battle element is the main attraction, while the puzzle element is a means of attacking and defending against opponents, similar to the “command controls” and “action controls” of standard fighting games.

 

The voxel characters in the game can be customized to your liking!

Also, the “stunning fatality,” in which cute voxel models “scattered cruelly” when they lose a game, is also noteworthy!

■Story Mode

Treasure hunters go on a great adventure in a board game-like world in search of hidden treasures that will make their wishes come true!

Solve ancient puzzles and defeat powerful bosses protecting hidden treasures such as the Desert Sphinx, the Dragon of the Burning Ruins, and the Kraken of the Undersea Temple!

 

Not only adventurers from all over the world, but also thieves and bandits!

What is their wish ......?

 

Use your unique characters to obtain legendary treasures and make your wishes come true!

short_description: An “online asymmetric battle puzzle game” where players fight in 3vs1 battles!Enjoy heated battles in this simple-to-use match-3 puzzle!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
